title: Requires health insurance policy standard provisions to cover annual audiological and, if needed, speech-language pathology, examinations and evaluations
summary: Requires health insurance policy standard provisions to cover annual audiological examinations and evaluations and, if needed, speech-language pathology examinations and evaluations, prescribed by licensed physicians, audiologists, or speech-language pathologists.
